participant_1.background:
I drive a Tesla Model X because it is a great car for commuting to school and taking my pets on road trips.
I love reading and writing about animals, so my favorite websites are those that feature stories about pets and animal rescue.
I sometimes neglect my own needs in order to be there for my kids.
i like to be alone.
my favorite sport is basketball.

participant_2.background:
I work as a waiter and try my best to be a good father.
My most valued material possession is the notebook I keep my short stories in.
I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk.
i also enjoy reading novels by female authors and exploring new areas.
i graduated from princeton.

content.text: I drive a Tesla Model X, that's a really cool car!
Thanks! I like it because it's great for commuting to work and taking my kids on road trips.
That sounds like a great use for it. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have two dogs and a cat. I love animals!
Me too! I have three dogs and a cat. I also like to read and write about them.
That's awesome! I love reading and writing about animals too. I also like to think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk.
That's a great way to pass the time. I like to listen to music when I drive.
Me too! I also like to explore new areas. I graduated from Princeton, and I love to travel and experience different cultures.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to travel the world.
You should! It's a great way to learn about new cultures and meet new people.
I know, I know! I'll get there someday.
